item.title: How I Work
item.description: How I work, an informational manual Over the last couple of years, I’ve seen people share “instruction manuals” for themselves, shared through their personal websites. I recognize I’d value this instructional/informational overview for my own manager, so I might as well provide that for those who I manage, work with and report to. This article summarizes my motivations for doing this nicely, and a few of those that have inspired me are Isaac Hepworth and Den Delimarsky.
